text.p: These are the leading stories in the Tunisian press on Thursday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- President Ben Ali ends successful three-day visit to Argentina; two countries sign six cooperation accords.
- Economic Development Minister Baccar receives Italian Industry and Tourism Minister Pierluigi Bersani to discuss opportunities to increase cooperation in industry.
- Northern and southern Mediterranean countries discuss power grid connection in meeting in Tunis.
- Tunisia and Libya sign contract under which Tripoli will supply Tunis with oil worth $250 million in 1997.
